Instance.description: A season consists of the content of a season, which primarily includes holidays. This resource also is where a seasonal content is set for different season lengths.

TunableVariant.name: screen_slam
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, trigger this Screen Slam when transitioning to this season.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The screenslam to trigger, and hour of the day when it should appear to the users.

TunableVariant.name: slam
TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a ScreenSlam tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If true, the screen slam will be only be shown if the active Sim triggers it.

TunableVariant.name: audio_sting
TunableVariant.description: A sting to play at the same time as the screen slam. ***Some screen slams may appear to play a sting, but the audio is actually tuned on something else. Example: On CareerLevel tuning there already is a tunable, Promotion Audio Sting, to trigger a sting, so one is not necessary on the screen slam. Make sure to avoid having multiple stings play simultaneously.***

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description: If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

TunableTuple.name: key_based
TunableTuple.description: Screen Slam visual is dictated by a string key. Verify with your UI partner what this should be.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Key to use for the screenslam. This will be typically tied to what animation will play. Verify with your UI partner what the correct value to use will be.

TunableTuple.name: size_based
TunableTuple.description: Screen Slam visual is dictated by the value of the size tunable.

TunableVariant.name: icon
TunableVariant.description: , Icon to be displayed for the screen Slam.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a ScreenSlam tuning snippet.

TunableTuple.name: trigger_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

TunableList.name: season_length_content
TunableList.description: A mapping of season length option to the content contained within.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Content of a season, consisting primarily of season-specific holidays, as well as the timings of when early/late season begins within the season.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Drama node to be scheduled for this holiday.

TunableTuple.description: The day of the season, which is a week and day of week, relative to the start of the season.

Tunable.name: week_of_season
Tunable.description: Which week of the season this is. First week is week 0.

TunableVariant.name: whim_set
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then this season will offer a whim set to the Sim when it is that season.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A whim set that is active when this season is active.
